text: You are one of my best friend i have ever meet in my life i think that sufficient for your description. you are never forgettable man. Thanks for being my friend . Best of luck for your coming future.
author: Sunil  Kumar

text:
Or bhai ke hal chokha hi hoga,sale hrami se mile bhi kha NCC the best time pass system of iit kanpur.
4-5 ko ak sath kaise manage krta hai bhai. or vaise to milte hi rhge yha par but best for luck for your coming future.
author: Sunil  Kumar
